channel.title: Need help on server
channel.description: ok i made a server and did all the TUT from here. make an ip. poft foward download U torrent check runelocus status was up online and say playbale. but once i run my source its saying address already in used. went back to U Torrent and change port to 55555. and run source again then its playable i just dont get it? if im playing my server do i have to turn utorrent off first in order to log in? or just put utorrent on, when ever im not playing so my server can be online 24/7?? im stuck with this problem because i dont even know if anyone can log in to my server clueless.. will reall be appreciate if someone will tell me whats worng with this. :palm:

item.title: Need help on server
item.dc:creator: @d3m0nl0rd d3m0nl0rd
item.description:
@d3m0nl0rd wrote:

okey now i have an issue
how am i sopose to invite my friend to play with me?
do i have to send the client foilder into a rar and put it in magaupload or do i have to add some kind of source with the foilder?
because i made the client foilder into a rar n put it on magaupload and i tested out by downloading it
and open it and run, but it wont load…is it happening to me only since i have the source?
will it happen to them if other people download my client foilder n try to play it?
:palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Why would you use uTorrent if you’re portforwarding? the point of uTorrent is if you for some reason cannot port forward.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on server
item.dc:creator: @d3m0nl0rd d3m0nl0rd
item.description:
@d3m0nl0rd wrote:

ok i made a server and did all the TUT from here.
make an ip.
poft foward
download U torrent
check runelocus status was up online and say playbale.
but once i run my source its saying address already in used.
went back to U Torrent and change port to 55555.
and run source again then its playable i just dont get it?
if im playing my server do i have to turn utorrent off first in order to log in?
or just put utorrent on, when ever im not playing so my server can be online 24/7??
im stuck with this problem because i dont even know if anyone can log in to my server clueless…
will reall be appreciate if someone will tell me whats worng with this. :palm:

Read full topic
